arguments.description: The x position of the new sprite.
arguments.name: x

arguments.description: The y position of the new sprite.
arguments.name: y

arguments.description: The rotation of the new sprite.
arguments.name: r

arguments.description: The x scale of the new sprite.
arguments.name: sx

arguments.description: The y scale of the new sprite.
arguments.name: sy

arguments.description: The x origin offset of the new sprite.
arguments.name: ox

arguments.description: The y origin offset of the new sprite.
arguments.name: oy

arguments.description: The x shear factor of the new sprite.
arguments.name: kx

arguments.description: The y shear factor of the new sprite.
arguments.name: ky

returns.description: The id of the added sprite.
returns.name: id

shortDescription: Adds a sprite to the batch.
